page.name: Customer Service
page.page_description: Welcome to the Customer Service status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Customer Service OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Customer Service's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [WorldWide][Support] - ServiceNow
incidents.message: Start Time : 17/03/2023 10:05 UTC End Time : 17/03/2023 11:41 UTC Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.message: Start Time : 15/03/2023 07:16 UTC End Time : 15/03/2023 11:10 UTC Root cause : Side-effect of an operation on the infrastructure Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [Global][Public Cloud] - Control Panel Access
incidents.message: Start Time : 28/02/2023 16:00 UTC End Time : 28/02/2023 22:58 UTC Root cause : The incident was due to a load increase on the GRA clusters. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [GRA/UK/WAW/DE][Public Cloud] - API

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [EU][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API] - Public Cloud - Backend maintenance
incidents.message: Start time : 20/02/2023 08:00 UTC End time : 20/02/2023 12:00 UTC Service Impact : During the maintenance, Public Cloud services such as Customer panel, Order funnel, api.ovh.com routes, and administration features will be disturbed. Service Improvement : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance on its internal infrastructure to improve its reliability.
